ISIBHEDLELE ITYGERBERG NEZIBHEDLELE ZMAZINYO: UBUME






UBUME

IINKONZO



IINDABA

USHICILELO



UQHAGAMSHELWANO



Eli Candelo liyi Ntloko linenjongo yokulawula ngokuyimpumelelo nangokufanelekileyo iTygerberg/ neDental Academic complex. Kwakhona inoxanduva loku:

* Kwenza inkonzo yekliniki ekumgangatho ophakathi, iqeqeshe ize yenze nophando.
* Nike inkonzo equletheyo yezezimali.
* Nike ulawulo lwamajelo oluntu nenkonzo yenkxaso jikelele.
* Lawule iinkqubo zolondolozo ezisemgangathweni neenkonzo zamayeza nezomthetho.
* Nike iinkonzo zobunjineli.
